title: Oct. 10: Marist roundup
text: Posted Oct. 10, 2015 at 10:52 PM Updated at 11:21 PM Posted Oct. 10, 2015 at 10:52 PM Updated at 11:21 PM Football Marist 13, Campbell 10 Mike Maccarone’s second field goal was a 28-yarder with 7:49 to play, lifting Marist to the Pioneer Football League win in Buies Creek, N.C. The Marist defense followed with a fourth-down stop at the Red Foxes 23 and Wes Beans picked off a pass at the Marist 46 with seven seconds to play. Maccarone hit a 28-yarder in the first quarter. Marcellus Calhoun scored on a 1-yard play early in the third quarter for a 10-7 lead. Marist improved to 2-4, 1-2 PFL. Campbell fell to 3-3, 1-2 PFL. Cornwall’s Mike White was 14-for-31 for 223 yards, with no interceptions, though he was sacked five times. Calhoun had 13 carries for 56 yards and Garrett Clay had 12 rushes for 45 yards. Matt Tralli had five catches for 58 yards, Malik Simmons three for 60 and Lawrence Dickens three for 45. Jordyn Jean-Felix had seven tackles, Blaise Spinelli six and Cameron Gibson and Landon Moore five apiece. Women's soccer Marist 7, Fairfield 2 Marist: Red Foxes improve to 5-7-1 (4-2 MAAC); goals from Brianna Robinson (4th minute), Erica Crosier (13th, 63rd), Hope Quinonez (54th), Juliette Loccisano (73rd), Danielle Glazer (85th) and Paige Jacob (88th); Makala Foley 2 saves on 4 shots. Men’s soccer Marist 2, Fairfield 1 (OT) Marist: Red Foxes improve to 6-5-1 (4-0-1 MAAC); Connor Preece game-winner in 92nd minute; Mark Rajovic 3 saves on 4 shots. Women's volleyball Marist 3, Quinnipiac 0 Marist: Red Foxes (12-6, 5-2 MAAC) prevail 25-14, 33-31, 25-19 for fourth straight win; Kelsey Lahey 13 kills; Lexi Millington 15 digs; Liz Gassman 5 aces. recordonline.com Posted Oct. 10, 2015 at 10:52 PM Updated at 11:21 PM
